bs-bluespiceprojectfeedbackhelper-desc: Provides a fixed "submit bugs" panel at the bottom of the user interface
bs-bluespiceprojectfeedbackhelper-hint: Thank you for using '''BlueSpice'''. Please help us to improve the software and give us some [http://sourceforge.net/p/bluespice/discussion/1249667/ feedback]. Please report bugs to the [http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=add&group_id=358032&atid=1494709 bug tracker]. Thanks for your support!
bs-bluespiceprojectfeedbackhelper-confir: Do you want to disable this hint? If you click "Cancel" it will be hidden for seven days.
